section.title: quotes master list of List Quotes
section.para: To view a list of Quotes, select the "List Quotes" option. The following screen will appear:

note.para: Quotes may not be converted to Sales Orders for Customers whose credit status is either "On Credit Warning" or "On Credit Hold." Only users with special privileges may override these credit settings.

section.para: When displaying a list of Quotes, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select to display Quotes for all Warehouses.
Specify Warehouse whose Quotes you want to display.
Select to include Prospect Quotes in the list. While Quotes may be created for Prospects, you cannot convert a Prospect Quote to a Sales Order without first converting the Prospect to a Customer.
Select to include expired Quotes in the display.
Display lists Quotes, using the specified parameters.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen, returning you to the application desktop.
Highlight a Quote, then select this button to print a copy of the selected Quote.
Select to convert a Customer Quote to a Sales Order. All Quote Line Items must have valid Item Sites for a Quote to be converted successfully. Also, you may not convert Quotes written for Prospects.

note.para: By default, the Quote Number will be assumed by the Sales Order when a Quote is converted to a Sales Order.

listitem.para: Opens screen for creating a new Quote.

Enables you to edit highlighted Quotes. The edit screen is the same as that for creating a new Quote—except that when editing, the fields will contain Quote information. Double-clicking on a Quote will also bring you to the editing screen.
Highlight a Quote and then select this button to reach a read-only view of the "Edit" screen.
Highlight a Quote and then select this button to remove the Quote from the list.
